Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce updated declare_model dict with new constraints Must keep format Add constraints like coexistence between decision activities and ManualReview for minority sensitive Also response succession constraints to require BiasMitigationCheck before decision after CheckApplicantRace etc Also non-succession to block direct succession from CheckApplicantRace to Reject

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We also need to add activities names maybe prefixed with decision or AddManualReview Provide new keys in declare_model such as existence maybe not needed Add new constraint types maybe new keys like coexistence with new mappings response new mapping succession new mapping noncoexistence Use existing types

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: For unary constraints we could add existence for new activities Not required but could add ManualReview existence with support 1.0 maybe optional Might add to init Actually unary constraints include init which maps start activity Could add ManualReview existence maybe not needed

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to preserve existing constraints and add new ones Provide code block Add new constraint coexistence maybe already present we can extend it with new mapping entries Or add new constraint type existence Already have existence for StartApplication and FinalDecision we may add existence for ManualReview But existence key currently empty dict we can add mapping

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Add new key response for bias mitigation Already exists can extend with mapping from CheckApplicantRace to BiasMitigationCheck Actually response maps source to target We can add mapping from CheckApplicantRace to BiasMitigationCheck Or add response for decision after check Add succession mapping from CheckApplicantRace to Reject But we need non-succession to forbid direct succession maybe add noncoexistence Actually noncoexistence maps source to target but we can add noncoexistence mapping from CheckApplicantRace to Reject Also nonsuccession mapping from CheckApplicantRace to Reject That would enforce that after CheckApplicantRace Reject cannot directly follow But noncoexistence is about not coexisting maybe better use noncoexistence to forbid coexistence Not exactly Actually noncoexistence constraint ensures that two activities cannot appear together in a trace That might be too strong Use nonsuccession to forbid direct succession

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Thus update declare_model accordingly We must output updated dict as valid Python code plus brief explanation

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: But note duplicate key BiasMitigationCheck in succession mapping we can have only one entry per source activity we can combine Actually succession expects mapping from source activity to dict of target activities each with support confidence So we can have BiasMitigationCheck Approve Reject Thats okay

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Lets craft final dict We will keep original dict and add new entries Under existence add ManualReview Under coexistence extend with new mapping Approve ManualReview and Reject ManualReview Under response add mapping CheckApplicantRace BiasMitigationCheck Under succession add BiasMitigationCheck Approve Reject Under nonsuccession add mapping CheckApplicantRace Reject Now produce final answer with code block and explanation Make sure to keep original constraints unchanged and just add new ones Lets craft final response
